aboutPet: He likes to play with toys that make noise, run around, and sniff things. He's good with children and other pets.
She likes to sleep and eat and hiss at everything. Not recommended for households with kids or other pets of any kind.
pottyTrained: Yes, but she'll go wherever and whenever she likes.

aboutPet: He likes to take naps and cuddle with toys. He is great for families with young children and other pets as he is very affectionate.
pottyTrained: Not yet, currently being potty trained

aboutPet: She is very energetic and loves to play with people and other dogs. However, she is scared of the outdoors and prefers the comfort of being inside.
He loves to stay active, he enjoys spending time outside and will keep himself occupied. If you can't find him, don't worry, he will always come back.
She is very independent and does not take well to people invading her space. Give her time and she will warm up to you and approach you.
pottyTrained: Not fully potty trained, she will ocassionally go wherever she wants to.

aboutPet: He is very timid and shy around men but never aggressive. He will approach once he feels comfortable around someone. Recommended for a small family.
pottyTrained: Yes, but when he gets nervous he will go.

aboutPet: He likes to cuddle with anyone laying down. Super friendly and would fit well in any kind of loving home.
She loves to play fetch and is very curious about other dogs. She would be a great fit for a family with other pets who love to play.
pottyTrained: Not yet, currently being potty trained.

aboutPet: He is the companion of one Captain Jack Sparrow and aids and interferes with much of his on boat shennanigans. Not suitable for a family as he is very mischievious.
pottyTrained: Its a monkey, they do their own thing.

aboutPet: Clover is certainly one of a kind. She is wise beyond understanding and can harness the power of all the other mythical creatures. She's smart, witty and loyal. She will make anyone's life interesting and fun.
pottyTrained: You don't ask a mythical creature how or where it does its business or you get the wrong side of the horn.
